subject: Fencing (Sport)
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s foil team lost the Olympic final to Russia by a lopsided score of 28-11 on Saturday, but the ninth-ranked Americans still won their first medal in foil.
snippet: The United States women’s foil team lost the Olympic final to Russia by a lopsided score of 28-11 on Saturday, but the ninth-ranked Americans still won their first medal in foil.
